title: Winnie Harlow dons a platinum blonde wig as she dresses up as a cheerleader for Halloween bash in LA
text:
She recently signed with LA-based talent agency CAA that represents some of Hollywood's biggest stars.

And, Winnie Harlow showed off her versatility on Monday night as she covered her brunette tresses with a platinum blonde wig while dressing up as a cheerleader for Anastasia Karanikolaou's Halloween party in West Hollywood, Los Angeles.

The Canadian model, 25, flaunted her slight physique in a pleated white mini skirt and a coordinating sports bra.

Give me a W! Winnie Harlow donned a platinum blonde wig while dressing up as a cheerleader for Anastasia Karanikolaou's Halloween party in West Hollywood, Los Angeles, on Monday

Winnie's bright white two-piece boasted a royal blue and red striped boarder, and she wrapped a matching jumper around her hips.

The supermodel flaunted her toned pins as she strolled along in white trainers and socks.

She carried her belongings in a tan coloured handbag, and further accessorised with cat eye sunglasses and large gold hoop earrings.

Taking to social media, Winnie documented her time at the Halloween party, sharing videos of herself dancing around with friends.

Here we go! The Canadian model flaunted her slight physique in a pleated white mini skirt and a coordinating sports bra

You go girl: Winnie's bright white two-piece boasted a royal blue and red striped boarder, and she wrapped a matching jumper around her hips

Finishing touches: Winnie accessorised with cat eye sunglasses and large gold hoop earrings

The model recently filmed a make-up routine with Vogue in honor of New York Fashion Week. During the video, she detailed the different tricks she uses on her vitiligo patches — a skin disease that causes discoloration.

'What I like to do is use Visine Eye Drops on the skin, on the white parts of my skin, to take the redness out,' the brunette beauty said while dropping the liquid onto her face.

Prior to adding Visine to patches of her face to help brighten the area, Winnie first cleanses her skin, followed by a homemade mask made up of manuka honey, Aztec Secret Indian Healing Clay and apple cider vinegar.

Leggy: The supermodel flaunted her toned pins in white trainers and socks as she stepped out of her vehicle upon arrival

Ready, let's go! Taking to social media, Winnie documented her evening

Gorgeous: Winnie wasn't scared to flash some flesh in her skimpy ensemble

Meanwhile, the media personality openly discussed the changes in the modelling industry and the standards of beauty.

Speaking to ELLE Magazine earlier this year, she said: 'There is a big shift happening in the fashion industry in terms of beauty standards, and I feel I’m part of that shift.

'I remember on America’s Next Top Model, Tyra Banks asked me if a photographer told me to cover my skin for a shoot, would I do it? I said no. I don’t care who it is, or who thinks I should. I’m going to stay true to myself.'

Fun times: She sharing videos of herself dancing around with friends at the Halloween party

The media personality was first propelled into the limelight after being discovered by Tyra on Instagram and being asked to appear on her show-America's Next Top Model in 2014. The model went on to finish in sixth place on the series.

Brunette beauty Winnie recently spoke out against being branded 'a sufferer' of the pigment disease, as she penned on Instagram: 'I'm not a "Vitiligo Sufferer" I'm not a "Vitiligo model."

'I am Winnie. I am a model. And I happen to have Vitiligo. Stop putting these titles on me or anyone else.'
description: The Canadian model, 25, flaunted her slight physique in a sporty ensemble as she stepped out for Anastasia Karanikolaou's Halloween party in West Hollywood, Los Angeles
